attributes.action: make Jamse May Minister of Transport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Together with the 'make Jeremy Clarkson Prime Minister' petition, I also believe Jamse May should be made the Minister of Transport. His ideas on transport make so much sense!!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
